name: Advent Calendar 2022
description:
An advent calendar to count down the days to Christmas 2022, with each day revealing a surprise toy from Synty POLYGON asset packs!

Throughout December, windows will unlock each day and the windows you've opened are saved, so come back each day until the 25th!

Click on an unlocked window to open and reveal the surprise. Click on an opened window to zoom in/out. Best viewed at full screen.

See the credits for assets and tools that were used.

I hope you enjoy this as much as I did making it!
